desc: Bhagwat also spoke about age among other subjects: “I have completed 75 years and informed the RSS, but the organisation asked me to continue working.”| India News

title: 'Showed him wedding saree, invite’: Bengaluru bodybuilder dies by suicide after girlfriend’s engagement; planned to celebrate Valentine’s Day together
desc:
A 26-year-old gym trainer and bodybuilder allegedly died by suicide at his home in north Bengaluru on Saturday evening after learning that the woman he loved was engaged to marry someone else.
The deceased has been identified as Kiran, a resident of Geleyara Balaga Layout in Mahalakshmi Layout.
He reportedly left behind a death note naming his lover and her mother as responsible for his death.
Kiran had been in a relationship with the woman for nearly three years. According to the preliminary investigation, the incident came to light on Saturday evening when he locked himself inside his room and died by hanging.
Family members told police that Kiran had been deeply distressed for the past two weeks after the woman informed him about her engagement and showed him her wedding invitation and a wedding saree.

title: Connecting home solar and electric vehicle batteries to the grid could boost South Africa’s clean energy and strengthen the electricity system
desc: South African homes need two-way meters so that they can feed extra solar power from home systems and electric vehicles back to the grid.
